source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Expressive Acrylic Landscape Painting - NEW DEMO ADDED!

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: Discover an approach that works!
objectives_summary: When you are finished with the class you will gain valuable tools for how to approach your subjects. Painting expressively doesn't mean slinging paint in every direction. There's a time to refine and time to let loose. Learning how to balance the two is what you will take away from the tutorials.

items.title: Sketch Anything in 10 Minutes (or less)
items.headline: Learn how to sketch quickly and effectively
objectives_summary: Sketch people, landscapes or objects in around 10 minutes

items.title: Digital Painting, Corel Painter Essentials, Beginners Guide

visible_instructors.name: Robin
visible_instructors.display_name: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development
visible_instructors.title: Robin Slee | Art | Illustration | iPad | Software Development

items.headline: Easy, follow along project - from sketch to final render using Corel Painter Essentials
objectives_summary: Create Painterly Style Digital Images
Explore The Corel Painter Essentials Application
Apply Traditional Painting Techniques To A Digital Workflow

items.title: Watercolor paint fun & easy GREETING CARDS for all occasions

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Fun for the eager painter who wants cut spending by painting original cards for family & friends. About 10 minutes each.
objectives_summary: Students will gain the confidence to paint their own cards.
Students will be able to paint quick and simple pictures.
Students will learn to stop overthinking the subject.

items.title: Copy me, learn & paint this watercolour in SIX EASY steps.

visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Learn as you paint this watercolour one step at a time, gaining confidence as you mix colours & paint wet into wet.
objectives_summary: Learn how to paint wet into wet with watercolour
Learn about colour mixing and colour values when painting buildings
See how to create shadows in watercolour paints.

items.title: How to Paint Eyes with Watercolour

visible_instructors.job_title: Watercolor Illustrator. Bc. of Architecture and Fine Arts.
visible_instructors.name: Julie
visible_instructors.title: Julie Ombré

items.headline: You will understand how easy to draw and paint eyes for your portraits
objectives_summary: Draw and paint realistic eyes with watercolour
Understand the influence of picture's background on human portrait
Learn how to create pencil eye sketch like a professional academic artists

items.title: Drawing The Human Head - Easy Methods For Your Head Drawings

visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor

items.headline: Learn easy to apply methods for mapping out face and neck structure. This course is beginner friendly.
objectives_summary: Basic shapes and forms of the human head.
Front, profile and back of head head construction.
How the neck attaches to the head.

items.title: Old Masters Drawing Techniques
items.headline: Learn the lost techniques of silverpoint, quill drawing, red chalk and trois crayons used by the old masters.
objectives_summary: Learn the craft of old masters drawing materials and techniques, including silverpoint, quill drawing, red chalk and trois crayon techniques. The course includes comprehensive demonstrations on how to draw using these techniques to achieve wonderful effects.

items.title: Colored Pencil for the Curious Beginner
items.headline: Drawing Basics
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn the basics of colored pencil drawing.
You will learn accurate measure techniques to reproduce an image from a reference photo.
You will learn layering techniques for shading, blending, and texture.

items.title: Create, Publish and Market "Photo" Coloring Books Online

visible_instructors.title: Dan Grijzenhout
visible_instructors.name: Dan
visible_instructors.job_title: 35+ Years of Consulting and Entrepreneurial Expertise!

items.headline: Turn Your Photographs Into Coloring Books and Market Them on Amazon!
objectives_summary: Create publishable coloring books from photos
Publish their coloring books on CreateSpace
Market their coloring books through Amazon and Ingram Spark

items.title: Introduction to Copperplate Calligraphy
items.headline: Take some time to collect your thoughts, and learn to write beautifully and with intention.
objectives_summary: Learn the fine art of writing beautifully by applying specific tools and rules - no matter what your handwriting looks like.
Brief history of Copperplate, its tools and characteristics
Setting your practice up for success

items.title: How to Value Art - A Step by Step Guide for All Abilities
items.headline: Learn how to value your Artwork from home. Follow this practical step by step guide.
objectives_summary: price your artworks from home
increase your knowledge of painting and the affordable art market
impress your friends and family!

items.title: Soap Making 101 with the cold method
items.headline: How to make soap with the cold process
objectives_summary: How to make soap bars with the cold method
Basic knowledge about the ingredients
How to use wisely sodium hydroxide in soap making

items.title: Practical & Easy Magic Tricks For Everyday People
items.headline: The most practical, easy and effective magic tricks anyone can learn and amaze without complicating techniques!
objectives_summary: Learn Practical & Easy Magic Tricks With Everyday Objects
Gain self confidence through effective performance
Easily entertain and amaze anyone

items.title: Plein Air Essentials - Oil Supplement

visible_instructors.title: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC
visible_instructors.name: Michael Chesley
visible_instructors.display_name: Michael Chesley Johnson AIS PSA MPAC

items.headline: If you've taken the basic Plein Air Essentials course and are an oil painter, then this is the course for you!
objectives_summary: By the time you finish this course, you should have a good working knowledge of painting in the field with oil.

items.title: Art Journaling: An Introduction

visible_instructors.title: Suzette Hussey
visible_instructors.name: Suzette
visible_instructors.job_title: Mixed Media Artist, Sculptor and Teacher

items.headline: An easy approach to art journaling using only a few basic supplies
objectives_summary: In this course you will learn how to get started creating your background without being intimidated by that blank page.
After adding layers to your background, you will learn about different focal points and adding them along with words and quotes.
You will complete three pages in your art journal by the end of this course!
